ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a really cool pie for hot summer months."
ins: Mix limeade (may substitute lemonade concentrate) and sweetened condensed milk in a large bowl.  Fold in nondairy whipped topping.  Pour filling into graham cracker crust.  Chill 2 to 3 hours.
